data.persona: I am the most powerful man in the country. I like that people fear me. I will destroy all that oppose me.
data.description:
You are in the Apothecary.
The Apothecary is filled with scores of scores of glass bottles. Each is a different color and has a different concoction. Scales and other types of medical devices line the shelves. There are many beakers and measuring devices. There is an entire walls with bags filled with different colored powders. There is a huge table in the middle.
The townperson is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the townsperson to get the secret letter from them.
data.mid_motivation: I want to read the secret letter, and find out who the poisoner is who has been targeting me.
data.long_motivation: I have lost four food tasters to the poisoner, and I want to search them out from the crowd of my court, and make an example of them for the whole kingdom to see.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: use Royal Note of Dismissal with Chemist

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: use Eyes with The Secret Letter

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: put Secret Letter on The Fire
